name: untethered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not physically connected or fastened to something: Helium is a colourless, odourless inert gas we associate most often with balloons that float skyward if left untethered.
An untethered animal is not tied to anything, so that it is free to move in a large area: The goats wandered untethered down the rough tracks.
not staying or forced to stay in one particular place: The cell phone also better serves a more untethered community, especially recent immigrants who value portability over traditional landlines.
